data.actual_result: it shows 'no mutual servers' until it gets the info
data.expected_result: the loading animation being shown while it is fetching the info (like mutual friends does)
data.short_description: mutual servers tab shows "no mutual servers" while loading
data.steps_to_repro: - not using super fast internet helps - reload client to clear caches - open the profile of someone you share servers with - open the mutual servers tab (try with a few if needed, for some reason some people seem to load realy quickly so you might miss it)
